title: Cozy 1+ bedroom apartment in charming home with gardens -util included
map_address: 814 Griggs St N near Hubbard Ave
posting_body: ['This cozy 1Bed/1Bath garden-level apartment is in a quiet secure triplex house.', ' This is in the great residential neighborhood of Midway in St Paul, not far from the corner of Lexington & Minnehaha and centrally located between St Paul and Minneapolis.', ' With the beautiful gardens, this listing is more than just an apartment - it is a home.', 'The apartment is available as early as Sept 1st.', ' You will be surrounded by the natural world with gardens around house and a park across the street with baseball in summer and ice skating in the winter.', 'A private fenced in backyard is available.', 'It is close to major bus lines and light-rail Green Line along University Avenue, area colleges (Hamline, etc.), and shopping (Super Target, Cub, and more), Como Park, State Fair.', 'The apartment features a full kitchen and bathroom.', 'There is a spacious storage closet in the unit with more storage space available.', 'Free on-site laundry is provided to residents, and heat, water, trash, and electricity are included in the monthly rent.', ' We are responsive landlords, and our tenants are usually long-term.', 'Cats are ok (Spayed/Neutered) -', 'Sorry, no dogs.', 'Other pets are considered on individual basis.', 'For you, we are requesting a maximum occupancy of 2 people with no severe allergies to the cat that also already lives in the house.', 'There is an application and background/credit check ($35 per applicant) -- clean history please.', "A security deposit of one month's rent must be paid upon acceptance, and the first month's rent can be paid at move-in.", 'An additional $500 damage deposit per-pet if applicable.', 'A one-year lease is required, then month-to-month.', 'No smoking or vaping in the house.', 'Sorry, we don’t work with Section 8 / GRH.', 'If you are interested, please contact us with your phone number.', 'Thanks', 'John & Libby']
